items.title: Dune
items.author: Frank Herbert
items.description: A young nobleman becomes embroiled in a desert planet’s fight for control of the universe’s most valuable resource.

items.title: The Hobbit
items.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
items.description: Bilbo Baggins embarks on a perilous journey with dwarves to reclaim their homeland from a fearsome dragon.

items.title: Neuromancer
items.author: William Gibson
items.description: A washed-up hacker is hired by a mysterious employer to hack into an AI, setting off a journey through cyberspace and dystopia.

items.title: It
items.author: Stephen King
items.description: A group of children in a small town confront an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewers every 27 years.

items.title: A Song of Ice and Fire: A Game of Thrones
items.author: George R.R. Martin
items.description: In a kingdom of warring factions, noble families vie for power while an ancient threat looms beyond the Wall.

items.title: The Left Hand of Darkness
items.author: Ursula K. Le Guin
items.description: On a planet where inhabitants can change gender, a political envoy navigates a treacherous journey toward diplomacy.

items.title: Frankenstein
items.author: Mary Shelley
items.description: A scientist creates life, only to be horrified by the monster he has made, resulting in tragedy and moral dilemmas.

items.title: The Martian
items.author: Andy Weir
items.description: A stranded astronaut uses his ingenuity to survive on Mars, while Earth works to bring him home.

items.title: Good Omens
items.author: Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett
items.description: An angel and a demon team up to prevent the apocalypse in a quirky and humorous tale of good and evil.

items.title: Dracula
items.author: Bram Stoker
items.description: A young lawyer faces terror when he becomes entangled with a centuries-old vampire who seeks to spread his evil.
